Projects

Following are some selected projects:

  1. Amlaan Bhoi, Chetan Velivela, Sudipta Swarnakar
    Lifeguard.io
    A 3D Convolutional Neural Network model developed on Microsoft Azure aimed to detect drowning people in swimming pools.

  2. Amlaan Bhoi, Sandeep Joshi
    MS-Apriori
    An association rule mining (unsupervised learning) algorithm with multiple minimum support.

  3. Sandeep Joshi, Amlaan Bhoi, Debojit Kaushik
    ARYouThereYet
    An ARKit iOS application utilizing Google Maps and Mapbox APIs to show nearby attractions in Augmented Reality.

  4. Amlaan Bhoi
    AutoColor
    A K-means clustering algorithm using OpenCV and Scikit-Learn that detects K dominant colors in an image. Autopicks K using Silhouette Coefficient metric.

This page is based on the design by Prof Alex Smola.
